data.description: The infill patterns are centered on the loaded 3D model. This setting allows to shift the center of the pattern on the Y axis.
data.img_description: The image on the left has no infill offset, the right one has a y offset of 10mm, the infill is moved 10mm up.
data.hints:
- A positive value moves the infill pattern up, a negative value moves it down.
- With some 3D models, moving the infill pattern could lead to beneficial results.
